title: What Are the Things You’d Love to See From Each Team Heading Into the Season? | Group Chat
description:
We respond to a list of listener submissions about what they’d love to see for their team heading into the 2019-20 NBA season, including: Markelle Fultz getting solid NBA minutes, the Knicks looking competent, the Bulls becoming relevant again, and the Hawks playing at least a shred of defense.

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Justin Verrier

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
